title: Green Day’s Billie Joe Armstrong Leads Crowd in Chant of “Fuck Donald Trump” at Independence Day Concert
description: The Green Day frontman also performed a portion of "The Star-Spangled Banner" during the band's set at Rock Werchter. Green Day’s Billie Joe Armstrong Leads Crowd in Chant of “Fuck Donald Trump” at Independence Day Concert Scoop Harrison
author: Scoop Harrison
excerpt: Green Day's Billie Joe Armstrong led a crowd in chanting "Fuck Donald Trump" during the band's headlining set at Rock Werchter on 4th of July.
text: No one would mistake Billie Joe Armstrong for a supporter of Donald Trump; the Green Day frontman has routinely taken jabs at the president and his “MAGA agenda” during the band’s concerts. But Armstrong seemed extra fired up during Green Day’s headlining set at Rock Werchter in Belgium on Friday — which just so happened to coincide with Independence Day and Trump’s signing of the so-called One, Big Beautiful Bill stripping medicare benefits from millions of Americans. html:
No one would mistake Billie Joe Armstrong for a supporter of Donald Trump; the Green Day frontman has routinely taken jabs at the president and his “MAGA agenda” during the band’s concerts. But Armstrong seemed extra fired up during Green Day’s headlining set at Rock Werchter in Belgium on Friday — which just so happened to coincide with Independence Day and Trump’s signing of the so-called One, Big Beautiful Bill stripping medicare benefits from millions of Americans.

Get Green Day Tickets Here

During the band’s performance of “Holiday”, Armstrong told his crew to cut the lights before leading the crowd in a chant of “Fuck Donald Trump.” While recent sets have also seen Armstrong incorporate political chants during “Holiday” (such as “Fuck ICE” and “No War”), none appear to have been as directly aimed at Trump himself.

That wasn’t the only striking moment of the night, however. Later in the set, Armstrong briefly covered “The Star-Spangled Banner” prior to “Wake Me Up When September Ends.”

Some guy here said that today Billie Joe would be absolutely PISSED on stage. Well, he was
